summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all-new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69-year-old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis-obsessed couple to win the ` ultimate wedding ' the winning duo will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 . elvis performed more than 830 sold-out shows .

aspect: 1. Priscilla Presley to witness first wedding at new chapel of love in Las Vegas;
2. Contest launched by Priscilla Presley and NBC's Today show;
3. Winning couple to tie the knot at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel.
explain: Priscilla Presley, being involved with the launch of a contest by NBC's Today Show, will witness the first wedding at the new Chapel of Love in Las Vegas for an Elvis-obsessed couple who have won the "ultimate wedding" experience at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on April 23. This event highlights the significance of Elvis Presley and his impact on Las Vegas's wedding industry.

Priscilla Presley, along with NBC's Today show, has launched a contest for an Elvis-obsessed couple to win an 'Ultimate Wedding,' which will be held at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on April 23. The goal is to celebrate Elvis' incredible impact on the world of entertainment and romance.

The winning couple in the contest will get to tie the knot at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel, which has significant historical and cultural importance for enthusiasts of the singer and his performances.
